message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I understand your budget constraints. Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $12,000. How about $14,000?
